column1: The Pit Room////Great authentic Texas bbq smoked in offset wood fired smokers. Sides are great too and have a Mexican food type of infusion. Brisket was excellent
column2: no sauce needed. The smoked Turkey also great
column3: very juicy and tender. Overall very impressed and worth the money. It's nice to sit over in the next door patio bar
column4: which has plenty of TVs. Also
column5: there is street parking if the lot is full.
